DOC.brief_summary: To compare the complete repair of the abdominal wall at the level of the former incision with only a partial repair at the level of the hernia in patients with an incisional hernia after median laparotomy in a prospective randomized trial.
DOC.brief_title: COMplete Versus PArtial Open inCisional Hernia Repair (COMPAC-TRIAL)
DOC.criteria: Written informed consent from the patient or his/her legal representative Incisional hernia requiring elective surgical repair No written informed consent Emergency surgery (incarcerated hernia) All incisional or parastomal hernias not originating at the midline All recurrent hernias All patients with mesh placed intraabdominally during surgery have to be withdrawn
